name: duccu-portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website for Quy Trong Duc Tran

scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm --prefix server ci || npm --prefix server install
scripts.build: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm --prefix client install --include=dev && npm --prefix client run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm i && npm run dev" "cd server && npm i && npm run dev"
